author: larryi
msg: Port code from Tomcat 4.x for handling special characters in tag names.

author: larryi
msg: Though it potentially causes the "-wait" option to malfunction, it is better
not to inadvertly cause shutdown problems if Tomcat is started twice.
If the "-wait" behavior is needed, externally make sure ajp12.id is deleted

author: larryi
msg: FilePermission("<some dir>/-","read") appears to give access to the
directory's contents and subdirectories, but doesn't grant direct access
to the directory.  For example, exists() on the directory isn't granted.  Adding
additionall FilePermissions to allow exists() on the web app's base and work

author: billbarker
msg: Fix the remove-context feature of the admin webapp.
Allowing users to leave off the leading "/", and (more importantly) making sure that we really do have a match before removing.
